attributes.action: Close all schools an universities whilst the 2nd lockdown goes on
attributes.additional_details: Protect children, teachers an families an have no further risk of people dying because you want the economy to grow. This is peoples lives your playing with. Bad decisions, an incompetence has led us to where we are now! The risk is not minimul for children an the science proves this
attributes.background: Close all schools an universities to stop the spread of covid19

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all Schools and colleges and Universities during second lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557413

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Force Universities to close commencing National Lockdown on November 5th 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558383
